ModMetaData.name: Musical Instruments (Continued) Patch
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
Musical Instruments (Continued)中的乐器不能播放音乐，本模组修复了这个问题。但是当载入存档时之前播放一半的音乐不会继续播放，直到小人下一次开始演奏。
The musical instruments in Musical Instruments (Continued) mod could not play music. This mod fixes that. The half-way played music will not continue when loading saves, until the pawns are starting another performance.
